meanings: (사물의 한 측면) one side, one aspect

meanings.meaning: one[the other] side of the shield

vlive.korean: 1000일 좋아 - 1000일면 거의 뭐 아이고 몇 살 때야? I like 1000 days. - 1000 days is like... How old is that? 듣기 View video VICTON : 다시 돌아온 빅토니 VLIVE💙💛
vlive.english: I like 1000 days. - 1000 days is like... How old is that?

vlive.korean: 난 MC 보고 - 두 팀의 이름은 무엇일을까요? I was the MC. - What were the teams' names? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.100
vlive.english: I was the MC. - What were the teams' names?

vlive.korean: [정답입니다] 얘 약간 맥일려고 그러는데? [Answer] I think she is trying to make us mad? 듣기 View video Hyomstore : ep13. 자신감 넘치는 MD들의 프레젠테이션 (feat.메이찬, 피피)
vlive.english: [Answer] I think she is trying to make us mad?

vlive.korean: 일까요? - 오늘은 무슨 날 - 아니 이게 뭐지? Guess! - What day is it today... - What's this? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 오늘 누구의 생일?? STAY 생일~!!! 🎉❤
vlive.english: Guess! - What day is it today... - What's this?

vlive.korean: 겨울은 몇 월부터 몇 월까지 일까요 그랬잖아요? I asked what months are winter? 듣기 View video KIM JAEJOONG : #김재중 의 입국 밀착 생방송 Live ♥
vlive.english: I asked what months are winter?

examples.korean: This is a side of Alan that I never knew existed. 발음듣기 이것은 내가 전혀 존재하는 줄 몰랐던 알란의 일면이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is a side of Alan that I never knew existed. 발음

examples.korean: When anger rises, think of the consequences. (Confucius) 발음듣기 노여움이 일면, 그 결과를 생각하라. (공자, 자기관리명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: When anger rises, think of the consequences. (Confucius) 발음

examples.korean: Remember to look at one side of the shield. 발음듣기 사물의 다른 일면을 보도록 해라. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Remember to look at one side of the shield. 발음

examples.korean: He has a gloomy turn of mind. 발음듣기 그에게는 어두운 일면이 있다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has a gloomy turn of mind. 발음

examples.korean: The story was on the front page. 발음듣기 그 기사는 일면에 났었어요. Neungyule
examples.english: The story was on the front page. 발음
